Tiffany <tnamwong@...> wrote:
 
>>!!!...note bandages around the lower chest...just like Sano...at this point in the story KEnshin already met Sano right? ... if this is S.H. and I THINK SO then Saitou would have already seen Sano with Kenshin... <<
 
Even if Saitou hadn't seen Sano yet, the wrappings seem to be common attire for the times.  I see them in a lot of movies and on other characters in anime.  Not sure if it was more common to street types, like Sano.  (Good practice for when he gets with Sano, ne?  He'll know how to get Sano in and out of them... though I have to admit, I much prefer it when he takes them off with his katana... ;-P)
 
phil (who still likes the stupid, tight, black t-shirt... he wears it *so* well!  Oh, and I have a screencap of the blue eye, too, which Black Faery thought strange as well)
